title: Wagahai wa Neko de Aru
synopsis: I is a cat without a name who lives with an English teacher, Mr. Kushami (Mr. Sneeze). "I" can't believe how stupid human beings are and chronicles some of their most incredible foibles. In particular, he is fascinated by Kushami's student Mizushima who falls in love with Haruko, the only daughter of businessman Kaneda.
related_anime: ['Wagahai wa Inu de Aru: Don Matsugorou no Seikatsu']
staff: [['Rintaro', ['Director']], ['Vivaldi, Antonio Lucio', ['Music']], ['Natsume, Souseki', ['Original Creator']], ['Komatsubara, Kazuo', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
